Synopsis: Converts an object to JSON format.
Description: The `dumpJson` function converts an object to JSON format using the `ConvertTo-Json` cmdlet.

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 1
Examples.Code:
$obj = @{
    Name = "John Doe"
    Age = 30
    Email = "johndoe@example.com"
}
dumpJson $obj
This example converts a hashtable object to JSON format.
